summary: Results-driven **Full Stack Developer** with **10 years of experience** specializing in frontend development, UI/UX optimization, and accessibility (a11y) across diverse industries including media, banking, healthcare, education, and IoT. Expert in **React, Angular, TypeScript,** and modern frontend frameworks with a proven track record of delivering **scalable, responsive, and accessible web applications.** Skilled at collaborating with cross-functional teams, mentoring developers, and leading projects using **Agile methodologies.** Passionate about optimizing application performance, improving user engagement, and achieving measurable business outcomes while leveraging backend technologies as needed.
